tool.name: Compute symmetric difference.
tool.description: This service shall return a feature collection representing the closure of the symmetric difference of two Geometries. The symmetric difference is the set of points which lie on either InputEntity1 or InputEntity2 but not in both.

param.name: InputEntity1
param.label: the first geometry
param.help: the first geometry to compare against.

param.name: InputEntity2
param.label: the other geometry
param.help: the other geometry to compare against.
